name: The Walking Stick
description:
A stylish old man who loves adrenaline enters a world where canes release power. Collect powerful canes and travel through the four biomes full of challenges and action in an endless fight to conquer this fantastic world.


Collect a dozen canes with unique powers, from canes with fire powers to lightning rods or technology...


and defeat the boss of each of the four biomes


Collect items to improve your character and make your canes more powerful

Acquire new skills and improve your canes.
Exclusive and original design.
